import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Grid, Segment, Header, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default class Polls extends Component { render() { const polls = [ {text:'Should I play Shaman?', options: 5 }, {text:'Should I play Rogue?', options: 2}, {text:'Should I play Warrior?', options: 10}, {text:'Should I play Priest?', options: 32}, ] return (
{polls.map(poll=>
{poll.text}
posted 2 hours ago
30 voters
 )}
) } }
